item.title: Apeing in Responsibly: Managing risk in the Float Alpha
item.description: “Apeing In Responsibly (AIR)” — the practice of depositing a large amount of liquidity in a protocol while understanding the risks. E.g. “Remember to AIR.”

item.title: Introducing Float Capital: The Future of On-Chain Assets Powered by Chainlink
item.description: First up, some massive news. The Float Capital Alpha goes LIVE on Polygon, this Friday, September 17, 2021.
